metadata.description: Relationship 'training_participant' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Relationship for participants of all trainings.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The link from the training to the participant.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The person details of the participant.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The position this person is currently in.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The health facility where this person works.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this health facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The link from the provider to the training details.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The training provider for this training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Set to yes if this training has been completed by date.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Set to 1 if there is a partcipant assigned to this training for totalling.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all participants in all trainings.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all participants in all trainings.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A list of all trainings with the number of participants.
